name: NwsomeTube
description: Dark theme for YouTube. Based on DarkTube by Nass O.

@-moz-document domain('youtube.com'), domain('m.ytimg.com'), domain('apis.google.com') {
  * {
    box-shadow: none;
    transition: color 0.25s ease-out, background-color 0.1s ease-out, opacity 0.1s ease-out, transform 0.1s ease-out;
    text-shadow: none !important;

  body,
  #body-container {
    background-color: #121212;

    background: #121212 !important;
    border: 1px solid #333 !important;

    display: none !important;
  }
  *::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb,
